name: Random Boyfriend Generator
description:
Bored? Looking for a quick date? Too lazy to actually go out to meet someone face to face? 

Well look no further! Here at Random Boyfriend Generator, we've got you all covered! Hit the Run Game button to start generating the guy of your dreams.
